parameterdescription.para: Contains the values and storage for the form

detaileddescription.para: On export, simply selects the serialized array from the db for a given template and presents it to the user. On import, a serialized template array and a name is supplied and a template record is created.

xrefdescription.para: Make array presented to the user more readable. (ie: unserialize and print to the screen)

parameterdescription.para: The values and storage for the form

simplesect.para: A form array to be rendered by drupal_get_form

parameterdescription.para: The values and storage that were submitted

detaileddescription.para:
This form is meant to be called from a bulk loader form. Blank Defaults are in place but you can use the following in the query of the path to set defaults for a given template:
template_id=+: the template to add the field to
record_id=+: the priority or key in the template array of the record to add the field to

parameterdescription.para: Contains the values and storage for the form

simplesect.para: A form array to be rendered by drupal_get_form

parameterdescription.para: The values and storage for the form

detaileddescription.para: All functions in this file pertain to administrative management of bulk loader templates
